text: Atam Nagar Assembly Constituency (Sl. No.: 62) is a Punjab Legislative Assembly constituency in Ludhiana district, Punjab state, India. ==Result== {| class="wikitable" width="70%" !Year||A C No.||Name||Party||Votes||Runner Up||Party||Votes |- |2017||62||Simarjeet Singh Bains||Lok Insaaf Party||53421||Kamal Jit Singh Karwal||INC||36508 |- |2012||62||Simarjit Singh Bains||IND||51063||Hira Singh Gabria||SAD||22560 |} ==Election results 2017== ==References== Category:Assembly constituencies of Punjab, India Category:Ludhiana district
